content: May 19, 2016 8  Patinkin’s Money, Interest, and Prices  The Real Balance Effect  Money, Interest, and Prices builds the integration of   monetary and value theory around the real balance effect,   often known as the Pigou effect, the presence of a wealth   effect in aggregate demand, which produces a stable   aggregate price dynamics at the level of the economy.
